entry.title: Hello Kartini Teknologi
entry.content:
Athazagoraphobia: the fear of forgetting, being forgotten or ignored, or being replaced. Dozywocie: parental contract with children guaranteeing lifelong support. Viraag: the emotional pain felt from being away from the person you love. Weemoed: lit. sadness, woe (wee) courage, daring, mood (moed); soft mood; light melancholy; having the strength to overcome a feeling of sorrow (e.g., arising in relation to nostalgia).. Njuta: to deeply enjoy, to profoundly appreciate.. Cynefin: a place where a person or an animal feels it ought to live and belong; it is where nature around you feels right and welcoming. Majime (真面目): reliable, responsible, diligent; seriousness, formality.. Schwärmerei: excessive or extreme enthusiasm or sentimentality..

Löyly: the steam that rises from the sauna heater when water is thrown on it. S’encoubler: to describe a fall, but specifically one where you fell due to being tangled in something. Gretchenfrage: a direct question with the intention of unveiling the underlying thoughts of the person being questioned. Nito-onna: a woman so dedicated to her career that she has no time to iron blouses, so dresses only in knitted tops.. Kucir: a tuft of hair left to grow on top of an otherwise bald head. Zažitjsja (зажиться): to keep living beyond the point where one feels they would be better off dead. Qì zhì (氣质): quality of character, disposition, style, charm, attractiveness, magnetism..

Aimonomia: being scared to learn the ‘why’ of something. Talaka: every member of a neighborhood getting together to do a work for free for a poor member of their community. Xíng qì (行氣): volitionally (e.g., mentally) circulating or directing qi.. Qualunquismo: political apathy; people who really don’t care very much about politics and related issues in society. Engili (ఎంగిలి): having contacted another’s mouth directly or indirectly via hand or utensil that is not fit for consumption.. Sankocha: the feeling of embarrassment due to receiving an inordinate or extravagent gift/favor, making you feel as though you need to return a favor that you can’t.
entry.summary: Athazagoraphobia: the fear of forgetting, being forgotten or ignored, or being replaced. Dozywocie: parental contract with children guara
